text:
Hi, I'm a tech recruiter for Rapid7. Below is a listing of our current openings in Austin, TX. If you're interested, you can reach me directly at samantha.oliver@rapid7.com.

All positions are ONSITE.

Senior Software Engineer, Metasploit Architecture http://www.rapid7.com/company/jobs.jsp?gh_jid=90250 Ruby & Java experience necessary.
